data.title: About Us : The Informix Experts at Oninit Consulting
data.meta_description: We are the UK's leading provider of Informix database support and services. Find out more about us and our comprehensive Infomix services:
data.text:
A message from Managing Director, John Baker

As the COVID-19 pandemic continues to impact daily life, I want to reassure all our customers that despite these unfamiliar times, our commitment to supporting you has not changed.

All of us are fully focused on enabling you to be productive and run your business effectively during this challenging time.

Continuity of service remains our top priority, and we are dedicated to maintaining your Informix installations with minimal disruption.

The team is equipped to work safely and securely from home and will continue to serve you on a 24/7 basis, using their expertise and experience to support both your immediate business continuity goals, as well as providing responsive solutions that can lay the foundations for ongoing transformation projects.

Oninit is here to support you during these unprecedented times and we are readily available for any Informix questions or concerns you have – whether you are an existing customer or not.

Stay safe.

John
